name: FileManager.DirectoryEnumerator
desc: An object that enumerates the contents of a directory.

items.name: var directoryAttributes: [FileAttributeKey : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary with the attributes of the directory at which enumeration started.

items.name: var fileAttributes: [FileAttributeKey : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary with the attributes of the most recently returned file or subdirectory (as referenced by the pathname).

items.name: var level: Int
items.desc: The number of levels deep the current object is in the directory hierarchy being enumerated.

items.name: func skipDescendents()
items.desc: Causes the receiver to skip recursion into the most recently obtained subdirectory.

items.name: func skipDescendants()
items.desc: Causes the receiver to skip recursion into the most recently obtained subdirectory.
